blocker.Name: First Blocker
blocker.Task: First Task (Can be N/A if the item in question is being applied to the whole story rather than a single task.)
blocker.Description: First Item in the list, can be N/A as well. This sub-item(Description) might be removed from later versions depending on how well it is used/received.
